I wanted to make sure you knew about our maintenance savings with Goodyear Commercial Tire & Service Centers. As an FTS Plus+ member, you can save up to $20 on PM and DOT services at Goodyear Commercial Tire & Service Centers.
Tractor PMs — Save $20.00 DOT Truck Inspections — Save $5.00 DOT Trailer Inspections — Save $5.00 DOT Tractor & Trailer Combo — Save $12.00
Simply visit any Goodyear Commercial Tire & Service Centers location, purchase an approved PM or DOT service, and fax a copy of your invoice to us at 877.902.1498. We will process your invoice(s), and the rebate will appear as a credit on your FTS card.
For full details and to find a Goodyear CTSC location, please visit ftsplus.com/goodyearctsc.
